SUBJECT:   Hi  
  Hi  
APOKO root products, is available, Attached is our company quotation
on how we supply product, Kindly open the attached file and let us
know when you need the product.
Regards.
Dr.Barbara Clark,
Vetmatrix Cooperation LLC
21046 W Broad St Arlington VA,United States of America
Email: 
cooperationllvetmatrixa@gmail.com
Memphis. TN, United State Tel: 1(901) 902-9474
/www.vetmatrixcooperation.com   
From: m***************s@gmail.com
To: vc38706@m**************m
Time: 2023-03-15 20:23:46
SUBJECT: Re: Hi
Dear  Mattie ,
Thanks for the reply, The name of the product is "Apoko roots product"
Please be informed that the product our company needs for supply is neither
pharmaceuticals nor medical devices. It is also not an industrial or
chemical product but a natural liquid oil solution produced locally with
special species of herbs and roots. Our company uses it to mix up with some
vaccines to obtain feed supplement for Agricultural use here.
The contract to supply this product was awarded by the Government of this
country as informed in my previous mail, if you can cooperate and are ready
to do this business we can work it out and you can become the major
supplier of this product to our company for many years to come, be informed
that you can get the product from local dealers in countries such as
India,and the United States of America only.
I can forward to you details of the local dealers of the product in any of
the countries mentioned above which you can easily contact and travel to do
the business as our company is ready to meet with you as supplier in any
part of the world to transact the business with you as the supplier.
You can find detailed information of the product {Apoko roots product} in
the product specifications that the local dealer will forward to you upon
contacting them for enquiries of the product and procedures to deliver upon
order of the product from clients and customers.
And i asked you to kindly let me know the particular country you can travel
to now among the 2 countries mentioned here above and i will sent the
contact details and address of the company to you to enable you to contact
them and confirm before you travel to the country to transact the business,
our company is ready now to order the product.
Looking forward to your response as soon as possible to proceed.
Regards.
Mr.Mohammed Chambas,contact phone/WhatsApp number +233245661334
